answers.answer: What is a glucose test ? Ftm
I had mine and had a high reading so have to go back:(A glucose test is done at around 28 weeks to see if you have gestational diabetes. Not fun
How is the test done? I am 20 weeks
Its not bad at all you have drink a juice that the doctor gives to you and then they draw your blood n you have to wait till your next apointment to know the results. I had my a day ago at 26 weeks.

I just had mine also..it was terrible for me they were so busy I couldn't eat so I didn't eat till like 5!!& almost fainted when theg drew blood i was feeling sick! & i hated that drink.the wrapping on it said not to drink all of it if your pregnant?My baby was so mad & hungry! I never felt him kick so hard haha!

question: I went to the dr today <3 had my dang glucose test.. not sure how i did but i fasted like they wanted. I am 28 weeks +2d and i got another apt. On the 10th :) its my 3d ultrasound and i just cant wait!!!! Im so excited. Im also excited about tomorrow <3 yummy food :D
title: finally
